markdownRemark.html: Software Developer with an interest in remote sensing, infosec and embedded development.

node.html:
I'm heavily involved in the UK hackathon scene, attending over 20 hackathons during my time as an undergraduate, co-founded CovHack and started the wiki for hackathons in the uk.

You can see some of my projects on my devpost
Most of my projects are on my GitHub.

I've travelled to over 30 countries, doing things such as:

  • Backpacking through Central Asia (Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan and Uzbekistan) and the Southern Caucasus (Azerbaijan, Georgia and Armenia).
  • Doing a Internship based around remote sensing in Cape Town, South Africa
  • Cultural Exchanges in Oslo (Norway), Helsinki (Finland) and Guangzhou (China)

Currently UK based, but I'm open to remote work or relocation to mainland Europe, Ireland, Canada or South Africa.

You can discuss opportunities with me at b+hiring AT horn.uk.
